abstract: "Grave Robber," by a controversial Czech artist and prankster who goes by the name Roman Tyc, features a series of portraits that incorporate human ash.
snippet: "Grave Robber," by a controversial Czech artist and prankster who goes by the name Roman Tyc, features a series of portraits that incorporate human ash.
lead_paragraph: Morbid? Perhaps. Intriguing? Without a doubt.

headline.main: Prague Art Show Courts Controversy With Unusual Element
